description: Shopee Open Platform is a platform providing Open APIs and services to support developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs
notes:
This appears to be the main introduction/overview page of Shopee Open Platform documentation. Key information extracted:

- Documentation supports multiple languages: English, 简体中文, 繁體中文, Português, ไทย
- Main sections visible:
  - Getting Started
  - API calls
  - Push Mechanism notifications
  - Authorization and Authentication
  - Sandbox Testing V2
  - Service Partner Program
  - Various API integration guides (CNSC, KRSC)

The page focuses on platform overview rather than specific API endpoints. It describes platform capabilities, benefits, and access requirements for two types of users:
1. Software service providers
2. Sellers with software development capabilities

platform_features.name: Powerful APIs
platform_features.description: Access to APIs for orders, products, marketing and push notification services

platform_features.name: Developer Services
platform_features.description: End-to-end developer support including onboarding, testing, release, and maintenance

platform_features.name: Management Tools
platform_features.description: Access to API testing tools, test accounts and sandbox environments
